item.title: Elegant Exception Handling
item.description:
Description

Error handling is hard. Regardless of the approach you take, it usually means littering your application with checks and validations that greatly reduce code readability. So how can we tackle exceptions?
item.dc:creator: Eyal Trabelsi

item.title: Practical Optimisations for Pandas
item.description:
Description

Writing performant pandas code is not an easy task, in this talk I will explain how to find the bottlenecks and how to write proper code with computational efficiency, and memory optimisation in mind.
item.dc:creator: Eyal Trabelsi
